scholarship_name: Christopher Kolade Foundation SHE Soars Scholarship 2025
official_link: Official application link of the Christopher Kolade Foundation

specific_requirements: Must be female graduate of a Nigerian public secondary school
Admission into a Nigerian public university required
5 O-Level credits in one sitting (Math/English required).
Must not be a beneficiary of any other Oil and Gas industry scholarship.
Female candidates are strongly encouraged to apply.

provider: Federal Government & Petroleum Development Trust Fund

specific_requirements: Course must be related to Oil & Gas industry/Management.
Transcripts for first year of study required.
Must be a citizen of Nigeria.
Completed secondary education at a public secondary school (state, federal, or military).
5 distinctions in WASSCE/NECO (including Math/English) in one sitting.
Must be enrolled in a Federal University in Nigeria.
Minimum of 6 O-level credits in one sitting.
Not a beneficiary of other Oil & Gas scholarships.
